      • editProperty

        public void editProperty(java.lang.String key,
                         java.lang.Object value)
        Add a property to the configuration. If it already exists then the value stated here will be added to the configuration entry. For example, if the property: resource.loader = file is already present in the configuration and you call addProperty("resource.loader", "classpath") Then you will end up with a List like the following: ["file", "classpath"] Specified by: addProperty(...) in Configuration Parameters: key The key to add the property
        Parameters:
        key -
        value -
